root: ^NPC: Greeting Mr.Hero! Can I help you with anything?

c-0: ^ Player: I would like to ask more about the maps

Tutorial: ^NPC: Tutorial Scene allows player to learn and play around with the controls
Spawn: ^NPC: Spawn Scene is where player first get spawned and start with the first task
Village: ^NPC: Village Scene is where player starts to get familiar with in game techniques
Bonding: ^NPC: Bonding Town allows player to start learning chemical bonding. Read the books and answer the quizzes
Structure: ^NPC: Structure Town allows player to learn atomic strucure. Aside from quizzes, new in game technique is added!
Periodic: ^NPC: Periodic Town is the last practice scene where player will be learning Periodic Table. Get excited with this last practice!
Campuses: ^NPC: Campuses are as name suggested, player will be learning at there, be it read books or perform in game techniques.
Final: ^NPC: Final Scene is for player to deal with the gods' questions. Try to complete them using the knowledge throughout the levels.
Zen: ^NPC: Player should be reaching the garden after completing the challenges. Player shall be freed by the gods by then.
EndPart: ^Player: Thank you for the information I will take my leave now
^NPC: Welcome, not a problem! Good Luck on your journey!
